q: Ministry, but it constitutes a separate ministry in the new government. While protesters dismissed the Cabinet reshuffle as cosmetic and demanded Hosni Mubarak 's immediate ouster, Zahi Hawass said Egyptians should give his boss more time. The people in the streets have to give this government an opportunity to change, he said cheerfully.`` Beautiful things happened in the last five days.'' He's used to the Washington game of lay blame and be partisan. He's going to have a hard time making the transition I believe. It might be May or later before Mike Pence would formally jump into the governor's face since state law prohibits political fundraising by statewide candidates until after the Legislature's session ends in late April. he could launch a bid for higher office. Mike Pence will speak in the Indiana State House Tuesday afternoon about the need for a more limited government and the importance of state government. This nation faces serious challenges that will require us to renew our commitment to institutions resilient enough to lead America back, he will say, according to prepared remarks.`` I believe those are the institutions of faith, family, community and state government. To renew our nation we must have a renewal of American federalism.''

the collapse of such a dictatorship was`` inevitable'' in Egypt, as well as in other countries throughout the world.`` What comes next, it's hard to predict,'' Patrick Leahy said. A huge part of( Egypt's) natural product is tourism. They've got to get tourists feeling free to go back. Nobody's about to book a trip to Egypt right now.`` The United States really needs stability there, Patrick Leahy continued,`` because of our interests in Israel and Jordan and elsewhere.'' Sen. Bernie Sanders , I-Vt., had a similar response and called on the United States to support a transition to democracy.
